channel.title: Request for Signature
channel.description:
I want a signature. Don't have to be too good. The theme could really be anything... i dont like those cartoon sigs tho... sorry if you do, just never really liked those shows... I like halo and such, so a sig with that could work. just make it look cool, thats all i really care about. oh, and dont make it too big, i want it to be short and long, (around like 1 inch tall by 2 or 2 1/2 inches long).
thanks for the help if you make one for me![br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2008, 07:26:58 PM[/size][hr]you can go here for some images of halo 3...
[url=http://www.flickr.com/search/?q=halo+3]http://www.flickr.com/search/?q=halo+3[/url]
[url=http://images.google.com/images?hl=en&q=halo+3&gbv=2]http://images.google.com/images?hl=en&q=halo+3&gbv=2[/url]
go through the pages for more...
